有限深度搜索: Depth-Limited search (DLS) is an algorithm for traversing or searching tree or graph data structures. It's actually specific type of DFS where the search is limited to some depth from start node (root). One starts at the root (selecting some arbitrary node as the root in the case of a graph) and explores as far as possible (within some limit) along each branch before backtracking.

files.后代计数: 记录所有相同深度后代的数量
